summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1302, for the improvement of the alley in Blocks Twenty-one (21) and Twenty-two (22) of A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Third Avenue and Fourth Avenue, from Pine Street to Union Street, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation; together with all other necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14242 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
